definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Weighted geometric means combination forecasting is a kind of nonlinear combination forecasting method.
sentences.chinese: 加權幾何平均組合預測爲一種非線性的組合預測方法。

sentences.english: Currently, algorithms based on graph cut take pixels as vertexes, therefore, real-time of segmentation is poor.
sentences.chinese: 由於加權圖的頂點規模較大，因此分割實時性較差。

sentences.english: Weighted abundance approach is suitable for the quantitative prediction in a target area with multi-mineral mineralizing series.
sentences.chinese: 加權丰度適合於多礦種的礦化系列的靶區定量預測。

sentences.english: The key of OLC algorithm is the selection of a weighted factor.
sentences.chinese: 普通多值邏輯控制器算法的關鍵是加權因子的選擇。

sentences.english: In this investigation, the method of weighted average was used as an arithmetical model of FSJ.
sentences.chinese: 並將加權平均作爲模糊綜合評判運算模型。

sentences.english: Comparasion Approach is taken for the treatment of evaluation standard.
sentences.chinese: 評價指標的加權處理採用了比較法。

sentences.english: The normal method of curtain-wall glass design is systematically elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲幕牆玻璃板加權殘值法分析計算。

sentences.english: Appreciation against a falling dollar leaves the yuan little changed on a trade-weighted basis.
sentences.chinese: 對貶值中的美元升值，貿易加權匯率就沒有什麼變化。

sentences.english: On a trade-weighted basis, the dollar has fallen by around 10% over the past six months.
sentences.chinese: 以貿易加權計算，美元在過去六個月貶值了約10%。

sentences.english: And recursive LSM formulas with weights using moving window are presented.
sentences.chinese: 並給出了帶移動窗的加權最小二乘遞推公式。

sentences.english: The fine coordinate average result was calculated with weighted average method.
sentences.chinese: 再利用加權平均法得到較精確的座標平均結果。

sentences.english: The weighted shortest path arborescence game.
sentences.chinese: 加權最短路樹形圖對策問題。

sentences.english: Note that the column that contains these weighting values is hidden in the previous figure.
sentences.chinese: 注意到包含這些加權值的列隱藏在前面的圖中。

sentences.english: This article introduces the weighted mean method to carry on theisohyet line.
sentences.chinese: 本文還引入距離加權平均法入行降雨等值線的繪製。

sentences.english: The remaining investments were approximately equally weighted across high-tech sectors.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的投資，大約同樣加權整個高科技產業。

sentences.english: In this paper, we investigate enhancement of naive Bayes classifier using feature weighting technique.
sentences.chinese: 該文利用特徵加權技術來增強樸素貝葉斯分類器。

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
(of a sum of money etc) receivable
